schema.body:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: MedCor Healthcare Platform API
  version: 2.0.0
  description: "\n# MedCor Healthcare Platform API Documentation\n\n## Overview\n\
    MedCor is a comprehensive multi-tenant healthcare management platform that provides\
    \ APIs for hospital management, patient care, appointment scheduling, and medical\
    \ records management.\n\n## API Workflow - Getting Started\n\n### Step 1: Create\
    \ a Hospital (Tenant)\nFirst, create a hospital/clinic which serves as the tenant\
    \ in our multi-tenant architecture:\n- **POST** `/api/hospitals/` - Create a new\
    \ hospital\n\n### Step 2: User Registration & Authentication\nRegister users and\
    \ assign them to hospitals:\n- **POST** `/api/auth/register/` - Register new user\
    \ (assign to hospital)\n- **POST** `/api/auth/login/` - Login and get JWT tokens\n\
    \n### Step 3: Create Core Entities\nAfter authentication, create the necessary\
    \ entities in order:\n\n1. **Doctors & Staff**\n   - **POST** `/api/auth/users/`\
    \ - Create doctor/nurse/staff accounts\n   - **POST** `/api/specialty/doctor-specialties/`\
    \ - Assign specialties to doctors\n\n2. **Availability & Scheduling**\n   - **POST**\
    \ `/api/appointments/availability-slots/` - Set doctor availability\n   - **GET**\
    \ `/api/appointments/availability-slots/` - View available slots\n\n3. **Patient\
    \ Management**\n   - **POST** `/api/auth/users/` - Create patient accounts\n \
    \  - **POST** `/api/medical-records/` - Create patient medical records\n\n4. **Appointments\
    \ & Treatments**\n   - **POST** `/api/appointments/` - Book appointments\n   -\
    \ **POST** `/api/treatments/` - Record treatments\n   - **POST** `/api/treatments/prescriptions/`\
    \ - Issue prescriptions\n\n## Authentication\nAll endpoints (except registration/login)\
    \ require JWT authentication:\n- Include `Authorization: Bearer <token>` in request\
    \ headers\n- Tokens expire after 60 minutes\n- Use refresh token endpoint to get\
    \ new access tokens\n\n## Multi-Tenancy\n- Each hospital is a separate tenant\n\
    - Users are associated with specific hospitals\n- Data is isolated between hospitals\n\
    - Admin users can manage multiple hospitals\n\n## Rate Limiting\n- 100 requests\
    \ per minute for authenticated users\n- 20 requests per minute for unauthenticated\
    \ users\n\n## Response Formats\nAll responses follow RESTful conventions with\
    \ appropriate HTTP status codes.\n    "
  contact:
    name: MedCor Support
    email: support@medcor.ai
  license:
    name: Proprietary
paths:
  /api/appointments/appointments/:
    get:
      operationId: appointments_appointments_list
      description: ViewSet for managing appointments.
      parameters:
      - in: query
        name: appointment_type
        schema:
          type: string
          enum:
          - CONSULTATION
          - EMERGENCY
          - FOLLOW_UP
          - LAB_TEST
          - ROUTINE_CHECKUP
          - SURGERY
          - TELEMEDICINE
          - THERAPY
          - VACCINATION
        description: |-
          * `CONSULTATION` - Consultation
          * `FOLLOW_UP` - Follow-up
          * `ROUTINE_CHECKUP` - Routine Checkup
          * `EMERGENCY` - Emergency
          * `TELEMEDICINE` - Telemedicine
          * `VACCINATION` - Vaccination
          * `LAB_TEST` - Lab Test
          * `SURGERY` - Surgery
          * `THERAPY` - Therapy
      - in: query
        name: doctor
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
      - name: ordering
        required: false
        in: query
        description: Which field to use when ordering the results.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - in: query
        name: patient
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
      - in: query
        name: scheduled_date
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      - in: query
        name: status
        schema:
          type: string
          enum:
          - CANCELLED
          - COMPLETED
          - IN_PROGRESS
          - NO_SHOW
          - RESCHEDULED
          - SCHEDULED
        description: |-
          * `SCHEDULED` - Scheduled
          * `IN_PROGRESS` - In Progress
          * `COMPLETED` - Completed
          * `CANCELLED` - Cancelled
          * `NO_SHOW` - No Show
          * `RESCHEDULED` - Rescheduled
      tags:
      - appointments
      security:
      - jwtAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedAppointmentList'
          description: ''
    post:
      operationId: appointments_appointments_create
      description: Create appointment with hospital from user.
      tags:
      - appointments
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppointmentCreateRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppointmentCreateRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppointmentCreateRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - jwtAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppointmentCreate'
          description: ''

      parameters:

        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        description: A UUID string identifying this appointment.
        required: true
      tags:

      security:

      responses:
        '204':
          description: No response body

                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
                  tokens:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      access:
                        type: string
                      refresh:
                        type: string
          description: ''

components:
  schemas:
    Appointment:
      type: object
      description: Serializer for Appointment model.
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          readOnly: true
        hospital:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          nullable: true
        hospital_name:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
        patient:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        patient_name:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
        patient_email:
          type: string
          format: email
          readOnly: true
        doctor:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        doctor_name:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
        doctor_email:
          type: string
          format: email
          readOnly: true
        doctor_specialization:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
        appointment_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppointmentTypeEnum'
        status:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/StatusA1cEnum'
        scheduled_date:
          type: string
          format: date
        scheduled_time:
          type: string
          format: time
        duration_minutes:
          type: integer
          maximum: 9223372036854775807
          minimum: -9223372036854775808
          format: int64
        end_time:
          type: string
          format: time
          readOnly: true
          nullable: true
        slot:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          nullable: true
          description: The doctor availability slot this appointment was booked in
        slot_details:
          allOf:
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DoctorAvailabilitySlot'
          readOnly: true
        check_in_time:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        start_time:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        end_time_actual:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        reason:
          type: string
        symptoms:
          type: string
        notes:
          type: string
        is_telemedicine:
          type: boolean
        meeting_link:
          type: string
          format: uri
          maxLength: 200
        meeting_id:
          type: string
          maxLength: 100
        meeting_password:
          type: string
          maxLength: 100
        is_follow_up:
          type: boolean
        parent_appointment:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          nullable: true
        cancellation_reason:
          type: string
        cancelled_by:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          nullable: true
        cancelled_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        rescheduled_from:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          nullable: true
        reminder_sent:
          type: boolean
        reminder_sent_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        is_past:
          type: boolean
          readOnly: true
        is_today:
          type: boolean
          readOnly: true
        is_upcoming:
          type: boolean
          readOnly: true
        metadata: {}
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          readOnly: true
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          readOnly: true
      required:
      - created_at
      - doctor
      - doctor_email
      - doctor_name
      - doctor_specialization
      - end_time
      - hospital_name
      - id
      - is_past
      - is_today
      - is_upcoming
      - patient
      - patient_email
      - patient_name
      - reason
      - scheduled_date
      - scheduled_time
      - slot_details
      - updated_at
